text.text: This plugin enables the use (and on the fly creation) of an AEM Foundation based scene with an embedded component content instance.

• AEM Touch
    opens the scene in the Touch UIs editor with all editing features of the embedded component enabled
  • AEM Classic
    opens the scene in the Classic UIs editor (Content Finder) with all editing features of the embedded component enabled
  • AEM Preview
    opens a preview of the scene with 'wcmmode=disabled'

On the scenes preparation a component resource of the 'current' - the selected - resource type is created and embedded in a new copy of a page preconfigured by this plugin. The scene is an editable page with the created component instance as an element of this page.

  • Prepare / Reset
    If there is no scenes content available a new scene page with an instance of the current component will be created and displayed using the selected tool or view. If the is a scene prepared a click to 'prepare' will reset the scenes page.
  • Remove
    Clicking this button the scene (the content) is removed immediately without each kind of confirmation. This information 'placeholder' is shown after the removal. If you prepare the scene again a new and fresh content resource will be embedded in the scenes page.
